    • dModel

      public Transformer.Options dModel(int dModel)
      Sets the number of expected features in the encoder/decoder inputs.
      Parameters:
      dModel - the number of expected features in the encoder/decoder inputs (default=512).
      Returns:
      this configuration object.

    • numHeads

      this configuration object.

    • activation

      public Transformer.Options activation(String activation)
      Sets the activation function of encoder/decoder intermediate layer.
      Parameters:
      activation - the activation function of encoder/decoder intermediate layer, e.g. “relu” or “gelu”. Default: relu
      Returns:
      this configuration object.
